CustomField.description: How Points are calculated. The options include: "Fixed Value" (Fixed assigned number of Points), "Factor" (numerical field related to the Target Object that can be divided by a specific number), "Multiplier" (numerical field related to the Target Object that can be multiplied by a specific number) and "None" (if using a different Point Type or another type of reward, such as Instant Reward or Instant Badge).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how Points are calculated: Fixed Value for fixed number of Points; Factor for numerical field that can be divided by a specific number; Multiplier for numerical field that can be multiplied by a specific number; or None if using another reward type
CustomField.label: Point Conversion Mode
